title: [W]Your response form (ET3)
helpTxt1: [W]To help you complete this, open the:
insetTxt1: [W]If you do not provide a response, a judgment may be issued against you without a hearing.
insetTxt2: [W]If you consider another person or company may be liable, you should still submit a response. You will have a chance in this response to explain why you think someone else may be liable.
